content:
Hello! In our Dataverse instance, we've implemented the ORCID and ROR API integration as described here:
https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-external-vocab-support/blob/main/examples/authorIDandAffilationUsingORCIDandROR.md

This has been a great additionâ€”thank you for providing this functionality!

Weâ€™re now exploring similar options for managing keywords (from the citation metadata block). Specifically, weâ€™d like to know if thereâ€™s any existing extension or feature that supports internal keyword suggestions.

Our goal is to promote consistency and reuse of existing keywords within the instance, while still allowing users the flexibility to add new ones when needed. A feature that suggests previously used keywords as users type would be ideal.

Thanks!
Aina

Have you seen https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-external-vocab-support/blob/7c4ae70f850522a966cd8e3831a51d59be8fca96/examples/keywordsUsingOntoPortal.md ?

There's a nice video showing keywords. @luddaniel added it in https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-external-vocab-support/pull/32
